amendment.description: To prohibit the granting of legal status, or adjustment of current status, to any individual who enters or entered the United States in violation of Federal law unless the border security measures authorized under Title I and section 233 are fully completed and fully operational.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3961 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 55. Record Vote Number: 121.

action.text: Amendment SA 3961 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Isakson. (consideration: CR S4537; text: CR S4537) To prohibit the granting of legal status, or adjustment of current status, to any individual who enters or entered the United States in violation of Federal law unless the border security measures authorized under Title I and section 233 are fully completed and fully operational.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3961 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 55. Record Vote Number: 121.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3961 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 55. Record Vote Number: 121.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3961 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Isakson.
